thread.title: A Compilation of Original Songs Sampled by Daft Punk Alongside the Daft Punk Songs Using Them
thread.title_full: A Compilation of Original Songs Sampled by Daft Punk Alongside the Daft Punk Songs Using Them

author: Lori Dorn
title: A Compilation of Original Songs Sampled by Daft Punk Alongside the Daft Punk Songs Using Them
text:
The enigmatic electronic music duo Daft Punk has released a really interesting compilation of the songs they’ve sampled , naming both artist and title, alongside an example of how they incorporated that sample in their own music. Such artists include Sister Sledge , George Duke , Tavares , Little Anthony and the Imperials , ELO and Barry Manilow . 
via The Awesomer 
Related Laughing Squid Posts How Daft Punk May Have Used a Sample to Create ‘One More Time’ Little Bird In the Street Dances In Perfect Time To the Daft Punk Song ‘Something About Us’ Simon Pegg & Nick Frost Perform a Cover of Daft Punk’s Song ‘Get Lucky’
